# Material & method

## Figure method maps

```{r}
worldmap <- sf::st_as_sf(getMap(resolution = "high"))

mastif_map<-rbind(tar_read(mastif.am,store="target_data")$df.tree, 
                  tar_read(mastif.eu,store="target_data")$df.tree) |> 
  select(plotID,lon,lat,species) |> 
  distinct() |> 
  ggplot()+
  geom_jitter(aes(lon,lat,color=species),width = 0.01,height = 0.01)+
  geom_sf(data=worldmap,fill=NA)+
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        axis.text = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        axis.title = element_blank())+
  ylim(c(25,70))+xlim(c(-130,35))
  

mastif.species.niche<-rbind(tar_read(mastif.am,store="target_data")$df.tree, 
                  tar_read(mastif.eu,store="target_data")$df.tree) |> 
  mutate(dh=pet-(map/12)) |> 
  mutate(fecEstSe=na_if(fecEstSe,0),
         fecEstMu=na_if(fecEstMu,0)) |> 
  filter(!is.na(fecEstMu)) |> filter(!is.na(fecEstSe)) |> 
  # compute numbers of observations per plot
  group_by(plotID,species,mat,dh) |> 
  summarise(n_plot=n(),
            fecEstMu_plot=mean(fecEstMu,na.rm=TRUE),
            se_plot=sqrt(sum(fecEstSe^2)/n_plot),
            cv_plot=se_plot/fecEstMu_plot) |> 
  # Compute mean of se per plot
  ungroup() |> 
  pivot_longer(cols=c("mat","dh"),
               names_to = "clim",
               values_to = "clim_val")  |> 
  filter(!is.na(clim_val)) |> 
  group_by(species,clim) |>
  summarise(#opt=weighted.quantile(clim_val,1/cv_plot,prob=0.5)[1],
    qlow=weighted.quantile(clim_val,1/cv_plot,prob=0.025)[1],#,probs=0.1)[1],
    qhigh=weighted.quantile(clim_val,1/cv_plot,prob=0.975)[1],
    qrange.mastif=qhigh-qlow,
    rhigh=weighted.quantile(clim_val,1/cv_plot, prob = 1- min(5, n())/n())[1],
    rlow=weighted.quantile(clim_val,1/cv_plot, prob = min(5, n())/n())[1],
    rrange.mastif=rhigh-rlow) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  pivot_longer(cols=c("qlow","qhigh","rhigh","rlow"),
               names_to = "limit",
               values_to = "value_mastif") |> 
  mutate(range.mastif=case_when(grepl("q",limit)~qrange.mastif,
                                grepl("r",limit)~rrange.mastif)) |> 
  select(-qrange.mastif,-rrange.mastif)

nfi.species.niche<-rbind(tar_read(fecundity.eu_clim,store="target_nfi"),
                         tar_read(fecundity.am_clim,store="target_nfi")) |> 
  # mutate(dh=12*pet-map) |> 
  filter(BA!=0) |> 
  filter(dh>(-2500)) |>
  pivot_longer(cols=c("mat","dh"),
               names_to = "clim",
               values_to = "clim_val")  |> 
  filter(!is.na(clim_val)) |> 
  group_by(species,clim) |>
  summarise(#opt=weighted.quantile(clim_val,BA,prob=0.5)[1],
    qlow=weighted.quantile(clim_val,BA,prob=0.025)[1],#,probs=0.1)[1],
    qhigh=weighted.quantile(clim_val,BA,prob=0.975)[1],
    qrange.nfi=qhigh-qlow,
    rhigh=weighted.quantile(clim_val,BA, prob = 1- min(5, n())/n())[1],
    rlow=weighted.quantile(clim_val,BA, prob = min(5, n())/n())[1],
    rrange.nfi=rhigh-rlow) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  pivot_longer(cols=c("qlow","qhigh","rhigh","rlow"),
               names_to = "limit",
               values_to = "value_nfi") |> 
  mutate(range.nfi=case_when(grepl("q",limit)~qrange.nfi,
                             grepl("r",limit)~rrange.nfi)) |> 
  select(-qrange.nfi,-rrange.nfi)

selection_ex<-mastif.species.niche |> 
  filter(species %in% c("fagusGrandifo","abiesProcera")) |> 
    left_join(nfi.species.niche,by=c("species","clim","limit")) |> 
  filter(grepl("q",limit)) |> 
  select(!matches("range")) |> 
  rename(Mastif=value_mastif,
         NFI=value_nfi) |> 
  mutate(clim=case_when(clim=="dh"~"Moist. def.",
                        clim=="mat"~"MAT")) |> 
  pivot_longer(cols=c("Mastif","NFI")) |> 
  pivot_wider(names_from = limit,values_from = value) |> 
  ggplot()+
  geom_linerange(aes(xmin=qlow,xmax=qhigh,color=name,y=clim),
                 size=3,
                 position = position_dodge(width=0.5,preserve="total"))+
  scale_color_manual(values=c("darkred","darkgrey"))+
  facet_wrap(clim~species,scales="free")+
  theme(strip.text=element_blank(),
        axis.text.y=element_text(angle=45),
        axis.line.x = element_line(colour="black"),
        axis.ticks.x=element_line(colour="black"))+
  labs(x="",y="",color="")
```

### figure
```{r}
species_n=fecundity.fit |> 
  filter(margin.temp%in%c("hot","cold")) |> 
  select(zone,margin.temp,species) |> 
  unique() |> 
  group_by(zone,margin.temp) |> 
  summarise(n=paste0("(",n(),")"))

signif<- fitcontinentdiscrete |>
  ungroup() |> 
  group_by(zone,margin.temp) |> 
  summarise(mean=mean(posterior),
            q05=quantile(posterior,prob=0.05),
            q95=quantile(posterior,prob=0.95)) |> 
  mutate(signif=(sign(q05)==sign(q95)))

text=fitcontinentdiscrete |> 
  filter(margin.temp%in%c("cold","hot"))|> 
  group_by(zone,margin.temp) |> summarise(med=median(posterior),ext=min(posterior)-0.1) |> 
  left_join(species_n,by=c("zone","margin.temp")) |>
  left_join(signif) |>
  mutate(star=if_else(signif,"*",""),
         margin.temp=case_when(margin.temp=="hot"~"Hot",
                               margin.temp=="cold"~"Cold"),
         zone=factor(zone,level=c("west","east","europe")))

data_env<-fecundity.fit |> 
  filter(margin.temp%in%c("cold","hot"))|> 
  group_by(zone,species,margin.temp) |> 
  summarise(med.dh=median(dh),
            med.mat=median(mat)) |> 
  group_by(margin.temp,zone) |> 
  mutate(max.mat=max(med.mat),
         min.mat=min(med.mat)) 
fitcontinentdiscrete |> 
  filter(margin.temp%in%c("cold","hot"))|> 
  mutate(margin.temp=case_when(margin.temp=="hot"~"Hot",
                               margin.temp=="cold"~"Cold")) |>
  ggplot()+
  geom_density_ridges(aes(x=posterior,y=zone,fill=zone),
                      scale=0.6,color=NA)+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0)+
  geom_text(data=text,aes(label=star,x=med,y=zone,color=zone),vjust=1.2,size=6)+
  geom_text(data=text,aes(label=n,x=med,y=zone),vjust=-0.5,size=3)+
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("firebrick4","firebrick1","slateblue"))+
```

### Theoritical model

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lme4)

# Set parameters
temp_min <- 5
temp_max <- 23
nsp1 <- 1000

# Generate data for four species
generate_species_data <- function(n, temp_min, temp_max, mean_func, sd1, sd2, sp_name) {
  temp <- runif(n, temp_min, temp_max)
  isp <- rnorm(n, mean = mean_func(temp), sd = sd1) + rnorm(n, 0, sd2)
  data.frame(temp, isp, sp = sp_name)
}

sp1 <- generate_species_data(nsp1, temp_min, temp_max, function(temp) 100 - 1.5 * temp, 3, 5, "sp1")
sp2 <- generate_species_data(1000, temp_min, temp_max, function(temp) 10 + 0.5 * temp, 1, 0, "sp2")
sp3 <- generate_species_data(1000, temp_min, temp_max, function(temp) 30 + 0.1 * temp, 1, 0, "sp3")
sp4 <- generate_species_data(1000, temp_min, temp_max, function(temp) 80 + 1.5 * temp, 1, 0, "sp4")

# Combine all species data
mod <- bind_rows(sp1, sp2, sp3, sp4) %>%
  group_by(sp) %>%
  mutate(margin.temp = case_when(
    temp <= quantile(temp, probs = 0.25) ~ "cold",
    temp < quantile(temp, probs = 0.625) & temp > quantile(temp, probs = 0.375) ~ "midtemp",
    temp >= quantile(temp, probs = 0.75) ~ "hot"
  ),
  margin.temp = factor(margin.temp, levels = c("midtemp", "cold", "hot")),
  lisp = log(isp / mean(isp))) %>%
  filter(margin.temp%in%c("hot","cold"))

# Plot the data
mod %>%
  ggplot(aes(margin.temp, lisp)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap(~ sp)

# Fit the linear mixed-effects model
lme_mod <- lmer(lisp ~ margin.temp + (1 | sp), data = mod)
lme_mod_rand <- lmer(lisp ~ margin.temp + (margin.temp | sp), data = mod)
summary(lme_mod)
summary(lme_mod_rand)
```

```{r}
  select(species_l,species,taxa,zone,biome,ntreeyear,nplot) |> 
  mutate(`Biogeographical zone`=case_when(zone %in% c("west","east")~paste0("North-",zone," America"),
                                          TRUE~"Europe"),
         biome=case_when(biome==4~"Temperate deciduous",
                         biome==5~"Temperate coniferous",
                         biome==6~"Boreal",
                         biome==8~"Temperate Grasslands",
                         biome==12~"Dry",
                         biome==13~"Dry"),
         `Large selection`=trunc(as.numeric(species%in%species_selection_large),digits=1),
         `Narrow selection`=trunc(as.numeric(species%in%species_selection_narrow),digits=1)) |> 
  rename(Species=species_l,
         Taxa=taxa,
         Biome=biome,
         `Tree year (MASTIF)`=ntreeyear,
         `NFI plots`=nplot) |> 
  select(Species,Taxa,`Biogeographical zone`,Biome,`Tree year (MASTIF)`,`NFI plots`,`Large selection`,`Narrow selection`) |> 
  arrange(Species)-> table
print(xtable::xtable(table),include.rownames=FALSE)
```

```{r}
model_data <- fitspecies |>
  ungroup() |> 
  left_join(data_env,by=c("species","margin.temp")) |> 
  filter(margin.temp%in%c("cold","hot"))|> 
  mutate(margin.temp=case_when(margin.temp=="hot"~"Hot",
                               margin.temp=="cold"~"Cold")) |> 
  group_by(zone,species,margin.temp,med.mat,max.mat,min.mat) |> 
  summarise(med.ISP=median(posterior),
            q05=quantile(posterior, prob=0.05)[[1]],
            q95=quantile(posterior, prob=0.95)[[1]]) |>
  mutate(signif=!(q05<0&q95>0)) |> ungroup() |> 
  # filter(signif) |> 
  group_by(margin.temp,zone) |> 
  do({
    model = lm(med.ISP ~ med.mat, data = .)
    data.frame(broom::tidy(model), .[1, ])
  }) %>%
  mutate(significant = (p.value < 0.05) & term =="med.mat" ) |> 
  group_by(zone,margin.temp) |>
  filter(sum(significant)>=1) |>
  # filter(zone=="europe") |> 
  dplyr::select(term,estimate,zone,margin.temp,max.mat,min.mat)
model_data=model_data |> 
  pivot_wider(names_from = term,
              values_from = estimate) |> 
  crossing(mat.pred=seq(-10,25,0.1)) |> 
  filter((mat.pred>min.mat)&(mat.pred<max.mat)) |> 
  mutate(pred.isp=`(Intercept)`+mat.pred*med.mat) 

fitspecies |>
```

```{r}
    mutate(margin.temp=case_when(mat<=weighted.quantile(mat,w=BA, prob=thresh)[[1]]~"cold",

           margin.deficit=case_when(dh<weighted.quantile(dh,w=BA, prob=thresh)[[1]]~"humid",
```
